tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE player_profiles (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  position VARCHAR(50),
  height INT,
  previous_teams VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE player_profiles (
	player_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	player_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
	position VARCHAR(50),
	height INTEGER,
	previous_teams VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE player_team_mapping (
	mapping_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
	player_id INTEGER REFERENCES player_profiles(player_id),
	team_id INTEGER REFERENCES team_profiles(team_id),
	start_date DATE,
	end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE Players (
  player_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
  position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  height INT,
  previous_teams VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerStats (
  stat_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  games_played INT,
  goals_scored INT,
  assists INT
);

CREATE TABLE Contracts (
  contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  player_id INT,
  team_id INT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerProfiles (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
    position VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    height FLOAT NOT NULL,
    previous_teams JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE MatchHistory (
    match_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id UUID NOT NULL,
    opponent_team_id UUID NOT NULL,
    match_date DATE NOT NULL,
    score JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE PlayerStats (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    player_id UUID NOT NULL,
    matches_played INT NOT NULL,
    goals_scored INT NOT NULL,
    assists INT NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE TeamStats (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    team_id UUID NOT NULL,
    matches_won INT NOT NULL,
    matches_lost INT NOT NULL,
    goals_for INT NOT NULL,
    goals_against INT NOT NULL
);
